snippet: Well known in its raw state, hamachi, or yellowtail, is now available in retail markets, thanks to Local Ocean, a fish farm in Hudson, N.Y.
abstract: Hamachi, or yellowtail, a fish in the jack family, well known in its rare state as sushi, sashimi and tartare is now available in retail markets for home cooks.
lead_paragraph: Well known in its raw state, hamachi, or yellowtail, is now available in retail markets, thanks to Local Ocean, a fish farm in Hudson, N.Y.

headline.seo: Hamachi, Rarely Sold for Retail, Now Available to Home Cooks
headline.main: Hamachi Now Available to Home Cooks
headline.print_headline: Hamachi Now Available To Home Cooks
